org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons

Class EventImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.EventImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventImpl

    public class EventImpl
extends Object
implements Event, Serializable
    EventImpl implements a serializable SPI Event.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type of this event: a constant defined by this interface. One of:
        • Event.NODE_ADDED
        • Event.NODE_REMOVED
        • Event.PROPERTY_ADDED
        • Event.PROPERTY_REMOVED
        • Event.PROPERTY_CHANGED
        • Event.NODE_MOVED
        • Event.PERSIST
        Specified by:
        getType in interface Event

        the type of this event.

      • getUserID

        public String getUserID()
        Returns the user ID connected with this event. This is the string returned by getUserID of the session that caused the event.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a String.
